languages.text: {n}По телу разливается приятное тепло: напиток неожиданно неплох. Служка набирает новый кубок и восклицает:{/n} "Пусть дух ваш будет крепче любого амасека!"
{n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"
languages.original_text: {n}По телу разливается приятное тепло: напиток неожиданно неплох. Служка набирает новый кубок и восклицает:{/n} "Пусть дух ваш будет крепче любого амасека!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads over your body. The liquor is surprisingly decent. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"
{n}A pleasant warmth spreads over your body. The liquor is surprisingly decent. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"
{n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"
{n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"
{n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"
{n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

languages.text: {n}一股令人愉悦的暖流传遍了你的全身，这里的艾玛赛克酒出乎意料地美味。仆人再次为你斟满了酒，大声说道。{/n}“愿您的精神比一切艾玛赛克酒更加强劲！”
languages.original_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一股令人愉悦的暖流传遍了你的全身，这里的艾玛赛克酒出乎意料地美味。仆人再次为你斟满了酒，大声说道。{/n}“愿您的精神比一切艾玛赛克酒更加强劲！”

languages.text: {n}心地よい温もりが体中に広がっていく。その酒は驚くほど飲みやすかった。給仕はもう一杯注ぎながら叫んだ。{/n}「あなた様の精神が、どんなアマセックよりも強靭でありますように！」
languages.original_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

traits.locale_text: {n}心地よい温もりが体中に広がっていく。その酒は驚くほど飲みやすかった。給仕はもう一杯注ぎながら叫んだ。{/n}「あなた様の精神が、どんなアマセックよりも強靭でありますように！」

languages.text: {n}Una agradable calidez se extiende por todo tu cuerpo. El licor es sorprendentemente delicioso. El paje te escancia otra copa y exclama:{/n} «¡Que su espíritu sea más fuerte que cualquier amasec!».
languages.original_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una agradable calidez se extiende por todo tu cuerpo. El licor es sorprendentemente delicioso. El paje te escancia otra copa y exclama:{/n} «¡Que su espíritu sea más fuerte que cualquier amasec!».

languages.text: {n}Bedenine hoş bir sıcaklık yayılıyor. İçki, şaşırtıcı derecede lezzetli. Hizmetkâr bir kadeh daha doldurup haykırıyor.{/n} "Ruhunuz amasekten sağlam olsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bedenine hoş bir sıcaklık yayılıyor. İçki, şaşırtıcı derecede lezzetli. Hizmetkâr bir kadeh daha doldurup haykırıyor.{/n} "Ruhunuz amasekten sağlam olsun!"

languages.text: {n}Une agréable sensation de chaleur se répand dans tout votre corps. La liqueur est étonnamment savoureuse. Le serviteur emplit une autre coupe et s'exclame :{/n} « Puisse votre clairvoyance être plus forte que n'importe quel amasec ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une agréable sensation de chaleur se répand dans tout votre corps. La liqueur est étonnamment savoureuse. Le serviteur emplit une autre coupe et s'exclame :{/n} « Puisse votre clairvoyance être plus forte que n'importe quel amasec ! »

languages.text: {n}Eine angenehme Wärme breitet sich in deinem Körper aus. Der Alkohol ist überraschend süffig. Der Diener füllt einen weiteren Becher und ruft: {/n}Möge Euer Geist stärker sein als jeder Amasec!"
languages.original_text: {n}A pleasant warmth spreads through your body. The liquor is surprisingly palatable. The servant fills another cup and exclaims,{/n} "May your spirit be stronger than any amasec!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine angenehme Wärme breitet sich in deinem Körper aus. Der Alkohol ist überraschend süffig. Der Diener füllt einen weiteren Becher und ruft: {/n}Möge Euer Geist stärker sein als jeder Amasec!"
